name: Mr. Eyeballs
description:
Objective: Mr. Eyeballs must collect all 4 Orbs before the timer runs out in order to win this small game but be sure NOT to defeat all the Odd Spector enemies! 

Good luck! 

GAME CONTROLS 

UP, LEFT, RIGHT, DOWN ARROWS - For Movement 

SPACE BAR - For Pausing 

TIMER: 360 seconds 

LIVES: 3x

EYE ORBS: Power Ups
